@@ -2680,1 +2680,7 @@
-    _slli(Rd, Rs1, shamt);                                                                   \

+    } else {                                                                                 \
+      if (Rd != Rs1) {                                                                        \
+        addi(Rd, Rs1, 0);                                                                    \
+      }                                                                                      \
+    }                                                                                        \
